trans-unit.source: Represents a viewport for a paginated <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> class.
Arranges the content to fit a specified view size.
The returned size will always be less than or equal to the specified `finalSize`.
The maximum size that the page view should use to arrange itself and its children.
The actual size that the page view used to arrange itself and its children.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> after finished using each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.

After <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application.

After calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> memory and resources.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> as the final call to release each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.

If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose%2A> is not called, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> associated with this view.
The document page associated with this view.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> used to retrieve content pages for this view.
The paginator that retrieves content pages for this view.
Gets the service object of the specified type.

<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService%2A> returns any services that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> provides if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
The type of service object to get.
A service object of type serviceType, or `null` if there is no service object of type serviceType.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child at a specified index.
`index` must be between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount%2A>-1.
The index of the visual child to return.
The visual child at the specified index.
index is less than zero, or greater than or equal to .
Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose"></xref> has been called for this instance.

`true` if <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose"></xref> has been called for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the available viewport size that can be given to display the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage"></xref>.
The returned size is always equal to or less than the given `availableSize`.
The maximum available size.
The actual desired size.
Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Invoked when the DPI setting for the document page view is changed.
The available size that the parent can give to the child.
This is soft constraint.
The DocumentPageView's desired size.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage"></xref> is connected.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage"></xref> is disconnected.
Gets or sets the page number of the current page displayed.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on.
No content is displayed if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber%2A> is set to a negative number.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The zero-based page number of the current page displayed.
The default is 0.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> enumeration that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The enumeration value that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch.Uniform"></xref>.

Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> enumeration that specifies in what scaling directions <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch"></xref> should be applied.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The enumeration value that specifies in what scaling directions <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch"></xref> should be applied.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection.DownOnly"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.StretchDirection"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch"></xref> dependency property.
Gets the number of visual children contained in this view.
The number of visual children contained in this view.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Use the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose"></xref> method instead.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Use the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService(System.Type)"></xref> method instead.
An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
A service object of type serviceType.
